name: The Dream Catcher
description:
Keys: 

'A' To Enter In Dream
'D' TO Leave The Dream
'S' To Attack

*Play Full Screen or scores wont be visible**Scroll a bit towards right if you dont see the fullscreen button and make sure to click on the game after pressing the fullscreen button*

Save people's dreams from becoming nightmares and make a highscore.

Instructions:
1. Kill the ghosts in dreams. As long as they scare the person it will deplete your life
2. If you get too close to the people in dream that will also deplete your life
3. There are two types of ghost, one of which is the happy ghost if you kill it, it gives you life
but it does not stay for long nor does the heart stay for long
4. You can punch a heart and increase it's lifespan (the more you punch the longer it stays)
5. After every a couple of seconds you will have to defeat the boss which gives you 10 score and 20 health
6. You can punch boss projectiles 3-4 times, deflect them and hit the boss with those. (extra damage)
7. Try to survive as long as you can.
8. Keep looking for ghosts in  different dreams till you find any especially if your life starts depleting

9.Beat the Highscore ( 78)

* Go over a person and press 'A' over him to enter his dream'

Story:
A couple of friends looking for thrill sleep at a haunted house. One of them brings his dreamcatcher hangs a
dreamcatcher nearby so they wont experience bad dreams. You play as the dreamcatcher spirit.
